Description:
With broad knowledge and ability to handle quality improvement projects, risk management, and utilization review, facilitating teams, basic computer operations, management of a hospital or healthcare setting including policies, procedures, and standards of medical practices applicable to all areas of specialization, thorough knowledge of medical and professional ethics.
Ability to solve problems of patients and personnel related to quality management.
Language Proficiency: Proficiency in English is essential, Arabic language proficiency is preferred.Job Details
